Plan_s_1_description: From Our Platform, we are aware of the great importance of the mental strength of a high-level athlete.
Plan_s_1_large_description: From Our Platform, we are aware of the great importance of the mental strength of a high-level athlete. Therefore, sports coaching is increasingly present in the daily sports life, hence our contribution in personal and sports value proposition to the users.
Plan_s_2_description: For any doubts that may arise for our users when making a certain sports decision.
Plan_s_2_large_description: For any doubts that may arise for our users when making a certain sports decision, Our platform has highly qualified personnel for such advice and to help make an informed decision.
Plan_s_3_description: Within the Sports Representation section, the user will be informed that we have the appropriate mechanisms.
Plan_s_3_large_description: Within the Sports Representation section, the user will be informed that we have the appropriate and highly qualified mechanisms to provide services to our users so that they can have Sports Representation through our platform.
Plan_s_4_description: Tranquility and peace in sports are essential for successful performance.
Plan_s_4_large_description: Tranquility and peace in sports are essential for successful performance. Therefore, we offer our users the option to obtain legal assistance in case of any contractual dispute with others.
Plan_1_description: Allows uploading 2 videos, each up to 2 minutes long, with a recommended quality of 1080 Full HD.
Plan_1_long_description: Basic Subscription: RRP ‚Ç¨19.99. Validity period of 1 month. Allows uploading 2 videos (3 videos) each up to 2 minutes long, with a recommended quality of 1080 Full HD. Upload a new video once you have filled your quota of 2; to do so, you must delete one from the platform to effectively upload, while keeping your 2 videos (3 videos) active. Highlight your video: RRP ‚Ç¨2.99 per video (Recommendation ‚Ç¨0.99 per video).
Plan_2_description: Allows uploading 5 videos, each up to 2 minutes long, with a recommended quality of 1080 Full HD.
Plan_2_long_description: Upload a new video once you have filled your quota of 5; to do so, you must delete one from the platform to effectively upload and maintain your 5 active videos.
Plan_3_description: Allows uploading 10 videos, each up to 2 minutes long, with a recommended quality of 1080 Full HD.
Plan_3_long_description: Upload a new video once you have filled your quota of 10; to do so, you must delete one from the platform to effectively upload and maintain your 10 active videos.
Plan_4_description: This subscription lasts for 12 months and allows unlimited video uploads, each up to 2 minutes long.
Plan_4_long_description: This subscription lasts for 12 months and allows unlimited video uploads, each up to 2 minutes long, with a recommended quality of 1080 Full HD.
